name: Gjallerhorn
skill: Increase damage dealt by 2 allies (ranged priority) for a limited time 74%/
ability: All melee allies take moderately less DMG.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a flute that signals the commencement of the final battle. The sound of the flute also gives a boost of encouragement to one's allies and summons assistance from the gods. However, in today's peaceful world without any wars between the gods, he has started using his powers to relay messages from the Bureau of the Occult to expeditionary forces in distan areas with poor cellphone coverage. More than anything else his voice is just really loud, so many spirits make sure not to tell him any secrets or personal information.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon from 30/08/2017 - 06/09/2017
◦ Trade at Exchange for 200 Mochi 06/09/2017
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Summon rate increased until 06/09/2017
◦ Can only be exchanged once

main: "Hear that? That's the sound of battle!"
summon: "You're in for a treat...if you like the sound of my flute, that is!"
